name: Storm in Desert
description:
Storm in Desert - a classic kill'em all third-person shooter with elements of Open World and variation of the passage, in the best tradition of the series.Many different game zones, cool twisted story and stunning shootout - all this awaits you in the vast endless desert in the universe Drudes Sandstorm. Can you survive in this crazy world?Features:
  • Elements of the open world
  • The intriguing plot
  • Trading Cards
  • Classic third-person shooter
